long_description: The sturdy, stylish Kurgo Backseat Barrier attaches to the back of your front seats, creating a soft wall that keeps Fido in the back and prevents driver distraction. Mesh frame keeps your dog from leaping-or launching during sudden braking-into the front seat. Fido can still see out the front and you can still reach back to give your dog a scratch on the head. Stays in place without getting in the way when passengers are in the back seat; pocket holds a water bottle or leash. Included straps and metal hardware let you install the Kurgo Backseat Barrier into most cars, from compact to SUV; does not accommodate 2-door cars or minivans.
short_description: The sturdy, stylish Kurgo Backseat Barrier attaches to the back of your front seats, creating a soft wall that keeps Fido in the back and prevents driver distraction.
